title: Run existing tests and validate environment
description:
Before any code changes, verify the project is in a healthy state:
1. Run the build: npm run build
2. Run lint: npm run lint
3. Verify dev environment setup (dependencies installed)
4. Check existing FO-01 flow works

BLOCKING CONDITIONS - Do not proceed if:
- Build fails
- Lint fails  
- Environment is misconfigured

If problems are found, EJECT with details.
acceptance_criteria: Build passes, lint passes, environment healthy
closed_reason: Verified all 6 FO-02 KV entries exist in database using query verification
